Can legendary skins be on sale?

No, legendary and ultimate skins (1820 RP and up) only get a ~26% discount during early sales (between 4 to 6 months after they're released) and then never again get a direct sale offer. They might be included in a bundle at a lower price, but they don't ever get a direct discount apart from that one-off early sale.
